inclusion.criterion: Male subjects, over 50 years of age at the time of enrollment.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subjects referred to urology for BPH leading to permanent indwelling bladder catheters
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: and are considered poor surgical candidates
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Written informed consent to participate in the study.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Ability to comply with the requirements of the study procedures
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: History of urethral stenosis or its management
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of recent hematochezia in the last 3 months
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Contraindication to intravascular iodinated contrast such as allergies or significant elevated creatinine/renal failure
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of BPH and underwent multiple urological procedures, including suprapubic prostatectomy. He currently has a permanent indwelling bladder catheter due to severe urethral stricture.
